Hi all,

 

Just thought I would get the word out early on this.

 

Gordon

 

MIDWEST TOKEN KAI  INC.

 

is pleased to announce 

 

CHICAGO 2007

*SHINSA*

By the NTHK from Japan

and

Sword show

90+ Tables (Last year sold out)

April 27-28-29

Sheraton Chicago Northwest: Arlington Heights Illinois

New dates: Beginning of Japans Golden Week, with a special invitation to
Japanese collectors and dealers

 

For information contact: Marc Porpora

Phone: 847-945-2627   or  e-mail: ichimonji7@...

 

Look for new web site, to come (under construction) midwesttokenkai.com
